description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，是广东省和河源市所在的国家。
description.en: A country in East Asia, which Guangdong Province and Heyuan City are part of.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区，河源市位于其境内。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China, where Heyuan City is located.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 河源市人民政府是广东省人民政府的业务下级单位。
description.en: The Heyuan Municipal People's Government is a business subordinate of the Guangdong Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 河源市人民政府是河源市人民代表大会的执行机关，对其负责并报告工作。
description.en: The Heyuan Municipal People's Government is the executive organ of the Heyuan Municipal People's Congress, responsible to it and reporting on its work.

relationships.target: 河源市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 在河源市人民代表大会闭会期间，河源市人民政府对河源市人民代表大会常务委员会负责并报告工作。
description.en: During the recess of the Heyuan Municipal People's Congress, the Heyuan Municipal People's Government is responsible to and reports its work to the Standing Committee of the Heyuan Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中国共产党河源市委员会

description.zh-cn: 河源市人民政府接受中国共产党河源市委员会的领导。
description.en: The Heyuan Municipal People's Government operates under the leadership of the Heyuan Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 中国共产党河源市人民政府党组

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党河源市人民政府党组是中国共产党在河源市人民政府中设立的领导机构。
description.en: The Party Leadership Group of the Heyuan Municipal People's Government is the leading party organ established within the Heyuan Municipal People's Government.
